Subject: Re: Helping To New Predacons
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

There is only one

After the rocks are cleared by the preadacon giant and her allies, all that
remains from the first war is scraps of metal lying everywhere, a red body
that once used to belong to a predacon but is burnt beyond recognition.
Lying close to it however is an intact body. Two large claws extend from
one large piece of silver metalic body with orange legs sorounding it, and
a tail with a stigner curled around the body. The hum from the computer
eminates from this body.

Computer: "Unit free of rocks, commencing reactivation..." with that the
computer hum dies down, replaced with a groan from the body. It trys to
stand up and right itself uncurling its legs from around its body. After it
rights itself its eyes slowly open, but when it sees the robots surrounding
it, it nervously starts clicking its pinshers and moves backward.

Strange Scorpion: " You're, you're not Megatron" it stammers weakly with a
hint of worry. Looking at the giant female he stammers again, "youre not
Blackaraknia" his claws start to click faster showing his worry and he
starts to speak to no one in particular "where the slag am I, what's going
on" then realizes he's surrounded again silences and the look of worry
replaces his face again.
